title: PMDG 777 Crack + Original DLL Files
description:
PLEASE FALLOW KINGASHI INSTRUCTIONS   THANK YOU 

Hello fellow pirates... 
How to make the T7 work:-

1) you have 2 files in a single crack. 1) Original 2) Patched..

2) Just copy the Patched file in the Gauges folder..

3) Select the T7 but dont press the fly button yet..

Final step before you start your flight

4) you have to move the patched file (only move do not copy) from the Gauges folder to FSX root folder and just copy the Original file into the gauges folder.. thats it.. 

5) After you stop flying it will ask you for gauge permission again dont press yes just press NO...

6) After you exit FSX just move the patched file from the root FSX folder back to Gauges and replace..

This is tested by myself and everything is working.. 

Its just a little work you have to do every time you wanna fly the T7....

I dont know anything about this torrent and its crack.. if it contains the two file then it will work or else just let me know i'll upload the working crack...

Have fun.. God Bless all
